title: Early evening sighting by a motorist traveling on I-79 near Grove City
observed: On Saturday, August 15, 2015 @ about 8:20 PM (Right before it got dark at about 8:30ish.), my family and I were driving home along I-70 South towards Pittsburgh. We had just passed the Grove City Outlets exit, about one or two miles, when I glanced to my left across the road and saw a Bigfoot walking back into the woods from the roadside brush.
location_details: About one to two miles south from the Grove City Outlets Exit on the left side if you were heading South across the road going North on I-79.
